results.description: Dundee United scrap their way to a 2-0 win over their city rivals to increase their lead to six points at the top of the Scottish Championship.
results.shortTitle: United extend lead with derby victory
results.title: Dundee 0-2 Dundee United: Robbie Neilson's side win battle at Dens Park

results.description: Dundee manager James McPake says extending a three-game winning run is his motivation rather than revenge for their last city derby thumping.
results.shortTitle: Points, not revenge is McPake motivation
results.title: Dundee v Dundee United: James McPake says points rather than revenge is motivation

results.description: Head coach Robbie Neilson says derby games will be vital in the Championship title race as Dundee United prepare for Friday's visit to Dens Park.
results.shortTitle: Derbies key to title - Dundee Utd boss
results.title: Dundee v Dundee United: Robbie Neilson says derbies will be key in title race

results.description: Test your knowledge on the history of Dundee derbies by trying our quiz
results.title: Dundee v Dundee Utd: Test your knowledge in our quiz

results.description: Manager James McPake is looking for derby revenge on Friday and says he never doubted Dundee would recover from a heavy loss at Tannadice in August.
results.shortTitle: McPake had faith after derby drubbing
results.title: James McPake: Dundee boss had faith after derby drubbing

results.description: Dundee FC's manager James McPake and Forfar player Gary Irvine deny charges allegedly committed in a Dundee pub.
results.shortTitle: Manager and player in court over pub 'disturbance'
results.title: Dundee FC manager and Forfar player in court after pub 'disturbance'

results.description: Substitute Jamie Ness scored a fantastic late winner to gift Dundee an important home win over Greenock Morton.
results.title: Highlights: Dundee 2-1 Greenock Morton

results.description: Inverness CT manager John Robertson thinks the Scottish Championship title will not be decided by budgets despite the Dundee clubs' financial dominance.
results.shortTitle: Title 'not a battle of wage bills'
results.title: Inverness CT: Money will not decide Scottish Championship, says John Robertson

thumbnail.altText: Inverness Caledonian Thistle manager John Robertson

results.description: Kane Hemmings' brace helps Dundee beat Alloa Athletic and record back-to-back wins for the first time this season.
results.shortTitle: Hemming brace helps Dundee beat Alloa
results.title: Alloa Athletic 0-3 Dundee: Kane Hemmings scores twice in win

results.description: Mark Kerr fails to guide Ayr top of the Scottish Championship on his managerial debut as Dundee claim their first away win of the season.
results.shortTitle: Dundee hand Ayr boss Kerr debut defeat
results.title: Ayr United 1-2 Dundee: New boss Mark Kerr loses first game in charge

results.description: Dundee sign goalkeeper Conor Hazard on loan from Celtic on an emergency loan after Jack Hamilton has his appendix removed.
results.shortTitle: Dundee sign Hazard after Hamilton op
results.title: Dundee sign Celtic's Conor Hazard signed after Jack Hamilton has appendix removed

results.description: Dundee concede three times in the last five minutes to lose at home to Partick Thistle in the Scottish Championship.
results.shortTitle: Late Dundee collapse as Partick win
results.title: Dundee 1-3 Partick Thistle: Late collapse from home side

results.description: James McPake and Forfar player Gary Irvine are alleged to have been involved in the incident in Dundee.
results.shortTitle: Dundee FC manager charged after pub disturbance
results.title: Dundee FC manager and Forfar player charged after pub disturbance

results.description: Declan McDaid scores his first goals for Dundee to ensure Arbroath's first league game against their neighbours in over 40 years ends in defeat.
results.shortTitle: McDaid double as Dundee beat Arbroath
results.title: Dundee 2-0 Arbroath: Declan McDaid scores first goals for hosts

results.description: Live coverage followed by match report of Friday's Scottish Championship game between Queen of the South and Dundee.
results.shortTitle: Dundee held at Queen of the South
results.title: Queen of the South 1-1 Dundee: Jordan McGhee rescues point for visitors

results.description: Former Scotland midfielder Graham Dorrans says he had talks with Premiership and English clubs before opting to join Dundee.
results.shortTitle: Dorrans 'talked to English clubs' before Dundee move
results.title: Graham Dorrans: Dundee midfielder aims to help develop club's youngsters

results.description: Morton earn their first win in four matches to climb fourth in the Scottish Championship as Peter Grant's header is enough to beat Dundee.
results.shortTitle: Morton go fourth with first win in four
results.title: Greenock Morton 1-0 Dundee: Ton go fourth with first win in four

thumbnail.altText: Peter Grant celebrates Morton's win over Dundee

results.description: Former Scotland midfielder Graham Dorrans has joined Dundee for the rest of the season after his release by Rangers.
results.shortTitle: Dorrans joins Dundee after Ibrox exit
results.title: Graham Dorrans: Midfielder signs for Dundee after Rangers exit

results.description: Jordan McGhee's strike brings Dundee their first three points in a month in a Scottish Championship win over Alloa.
results.shortTitle: Dundee end winless run to edge out Alloa
results.title: Dundee 2-1 Alloa Athletic: Jordan McGhee ends winless run for hosts

results.description: Dundee manager James McPake says free agent Graham Dorrans is a player he would "absolutely" like in his team.
results.shortTitle: Dundee boss McPake keen on Dorrans
results.title: Graham Dorrans: Former Rangers midfielder is Dundee target
